There is speculation that News Corp executives were keen to see Andy Coulson quit, amid fears that his continued presence inside No 10 was damaging the company's commercial interests , the Guardian wrote. Downing Street denied categorically that Rupert Murdoch had ordered Andy Coulson to quit. Andy Coulson 's resignation has also prompted Labour frontbencher Chris Bryant to call for the police to conduct a new investigation. Gordon Taylor
